MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PR8 postcode area of Southport, affecting properties in Tulketh Street, Talbot Street, Eastbank Street and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware at 2:41PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on out electrical network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 5.45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:20PM on Sunday 3rd January 2021.
